page.title: Symantec adds threat data to Managed Security Services
page.text: SAN FRANCISCO - In a bid to expand its services business, Symantec Corp. next week plans to start selling security intelligence data as an add-on to its Managed Security Services.<p>ADVERTISEMENT</p><p><img src="http://ad.doubleclick.net/ad/idg.us.ifw.general/sbcspotrssfeed;sz=1x1;ord=200301151450?" width="1" height="1" border="0"/><a href="http://ad.doubleclick.net/clk;11714255;9651165;g?http://infoworld.com/spotlights/sbc/main.html?lpid0101035400730403idlp">SBC Datacomm White Paper</a><br/>Find out how Crate Barrel expects to save \$180,000 by moving to VoIP, compared to a traditional PBX.</p>
